segments.advisor_message: Alright, just to clarify your employment status, you're currently self-employed, correct?
segments.client_message: Yes, that's right, self-employed, um, I work as a freelance graphic designer.

segments.advisor_message: Great! And how long have you been doing that?
segments.client_message: I started in, uh, January 2020, so just over three years now.

segments.advisor_message: Perfect, and one last thing, are you a tax resident here in the UK?
segments.client_message: Oh, yes, definitely, I've been living here for, um, quite a while now, so that, that's all good.
